# Authority Contract
a contract for managing permissions.

Name in parity registry: authority-v2

## Authority version 0.4.2
```
Mainnet: //0x56cadce6c2f02857faf06912a531bda33c3494e9
Ropsten: 0xf696cd9a423592d4b909d59fabb5acd7ed3aafd6
Kovan: 0xb7f53e4729ff687905a0852ca9d83aa277b1747d
```
Bytecode
